text:
Handy tip if you're animating in the browser.
<http://davidwalsh.name/translate3d>

attachments.title: Force Hardware Acceleration in WebKit with translate3d
attachments.text: Even if you're looking to do a basic 2d translation, use translate3d for more power! If your animation is still flickering after switching to the transform above
attachments.fallback: David Walsh Blog: Force Hardware Acceleration in WebKit with translate3d
